name: Darryl COOK, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, Judge Jeffrey Minehart and Lee Mandell, P.C., Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Cook v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Darryl COOK, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, Judge Jeffrey Minehart and Lee Mandell, P.C., Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 14th day of January, 2011, the Petition for Extraordinary Relief and the Application to Expedite are DISMISSED. See Commonwealth v. Reid, 537 Pa. 167, 642 A.2d 453 (1994) (hybrid representation not permitted). The Prothonotary is directed to forward the filings to counsel of record. Additionally, the Prothonotary is directed to strike the jurist’s name from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
12 A.3d 291
Darryl COOK, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, Judge Jeffrey Minehart and Lee Mandell, P.C., Petitioner.
No. 137 EM 2010.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 14, 2011.
